page.title: 18BIOGRAPHY
page.content: IN WEST TANFIELD WE HAVE A RECTOR CALLED THE REV DAVID EYLES, HE HAS BEEN A CHRISTIAN ALL HIS LIFE.HE WENT TO SCHOOL AT BILTON GRANGE PRIMARY ,HARROGATE AND THEN TO NEW PARK SECONDARY SCHOOL.IN HIS MID-TWENTIES MR.EYLES WANTED TO BECOME A FARMER BUT LATER HE FELT CALLED TO ENTER THE CHURCH.HE HAS BEEN A PRIEST FOR 8 YEARS,THE LAST 3 YEARS IN OUR VILLAGE. THE PARISH CONSISTS OF THE VILLAGES OF SNAPE,WELL WEST TANFIELD AND NORTH STAINLEY.MR.EYLES HAS PASTORAL RESPONSIBILITY FOR ALL THESE VILLAGES,AND HE VISITS ALL THE VILLAGE SCHOOLS IN THIS AREA EACH WEEK. MR EYLES LIKES ANIMALS HE HAS A MINI SMALL HOLDING WHICH INCLUDES 3 GOATS,25 SHEEP,1 HORSE,8 COCKRELS,20 CHICKENS,1 DOG AND 1 CAT.
